sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Title } from './components/Title' import { Round } from './components/Round' import { Playground } from './components/Playground' import { Profile } from './components/Profile' import { User } from './components/User' import { Choice } from './components/Choice' import { Computer } from './components/Computer' import { Score } from './components/Score' import { Message } from './components/Message' import { Reset } from './components/Reset' import { settings } from './assets/configs/game' import rock from './assets/rock.png' import paper from './assets/paper.png' import scissors from './assets/scissors.png' import trophy from './assets/trophy.png' import './style.css' export default function App() { let [game, setGame] = useState({ userSelection: '', pcSelection: '', round: 0, pcScore: 0, message: '', }) return (
<Round {...game} /> <Playground> <Profile> <User {...game} trophyIcon={trophy}> <Choice {...game} value='Rock' onClick={play} choiceIcon={rock} /> <Choice {...game} value='Paper' onClick={play} choiceIcon={paper} /> <Choice {...game} value='Scissors' onClick={play} choiceIcon={scissors} /> </User> <Score score={userScore} /> </Profile> <Profile> <Message {...game} rockIcon={rock} paperIcon={paper} scissorsIcon={scissors} trophyIcon={trophy} /> <Score score={pcScore} /> </Profile> </Playground> <Reset {...game} onClick={reset} /> </div> ) }
